title: Skeletal Horse On Trafalgar Square's 4th Plinth Is Art And A Stock Ticker
teaser: A bold statue has taken up residence in London's iconic Trafalgar Square â€” part of a public art project that's been going on for more than a decade. The skeletal horse replaces a giant blue rooster.
